name: Hiragana Memory Hint [English]
description: 1. Description  Study hiragana the fun way using mnemonic pictures  and check your understanding with a variety of quizzes!  Recommended for: Complete beginners in Japanese Anyone interested in Japanese letters  2. Features  -Features pictures, sound and animation to help you remember the hiragana characters. -Includes quizzes for checking your understanding of the hiragana youve learned. -Includes simple explanations about the Japanese writing system and the characters used in it. - hiragana table allows you to tap each hiragana to hear how its pronounced.  3. Tested Devices  AndroidSamsung Galaxy S5 ,Samsung Galaxy S4 ,Sony Xperia Z Ultra ,HTC J ONE ,Lenovo A916 , Asus ZenPhone 2 , Huawei Ascend G620S , LG Nexus5 , Asus Nexus7 2012 , Sony Xepria Z3 SOL26  4.Update [V1.0.1] - We have made some minor adjustments. [V1.0.2] - We have made changes to some of the illustrations. [V1.0.3] - We have made corrections to some of the wording.  5.Contact the Developer  If you have any questions or suggestions please feel free to send  them to us at the following email address. app-kc@jpf.go.jp
